post.author: Do'h!hmm...
post.body:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SxnKocX8 ... re=related

I'm pretty sure there weren't a teaser like this in quake3?

post.author: Bittoman
post.body:
That was pretty funny for the first few seconds...

That leads me to two complaints; 1) it was way too long 2) the clipping through the feathers was annoying. Other than that whoever did that model for the video was very detailed.

post.author: KoRnScythe
post.body:
Damn, dog! Fo sho, dat aint lookin' familiars da me.
Yo, done see that ho rollin' like a joint?

Why, lookee what we sure done have here.
We gots us one of thems there gang-bangin', rootin'-tootin' people shooters.
Grab your boomsticks, we're goin' huntin'!

Mofo, I is Fourty-Nine Cents, I's taken mo' bullets in my life dan' you ever breaves.

Woah, horsie!
Alright, punk, I don't know what hole you crawled out of, but this here is Texas.

Bonjour! (I do not know French, so it is time to speak... Cowphynx.)
Flew flew, chomo, plow floot poo.
